Row.Text: At the beginning of the game, you can sail in the ocean,And unlock technology "shipbuilding", shipping unit + 2 [Icon_Movement] movement, when producing civilian units + 30% [Icon_Production] build speed, coastal city + 5 [Icon_Power]per turn.

When there are three Unique districts in the city, a small amount of adjacent bonus in the area becomes a large amount of adjacent bonus，Additional + 4 output points when building power[ICON_Power] supply is sufficient.Great person [ICON_GreatPerson]get + 15% points, Ocean and coast + 2 production[ICON_PRODUCTION] and + 1 science[ICON_SCIENCE]，Citizen[ICON_Citizen] in coastal cities provides + 1 science, all coastal cities + 3 housing[ICON_HOUSING],After being declared war, + 10 strength[ICON_Strength] within 20 turns.

60 [ICON_FAVOR]favors can be obtained when recruiting [ICON_GreatPerson]great person support, after recruiting or sponsored a [ICON_GreatPerson]great person, will return the consumed 30% of [ICON_GreatPerson]great person points, ocean and the coast +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION]production and +1 [ICON_Culture]culture,and the [ICON_GreatEngineer]great engineers with the [ICON_GreatScientist]great scientist points + 20%, each in the coastal city has a [ICON_Citizen]population of +1 [ICON_Culture]culture, for all the coastal city of + 3 [ICON_HOUSING]housing,unlock code can obtain a wildcard slot.

Atri's Unique district,Instead of industrial district, the cost is lower and can only be built on land along the coast，Provide 4 points of basic production[ICON_PRODUCTION]，Get a lot of bonus from adjacent Marine resources、reefs、harbor and commerical hub, and provide standard adjacent bonus for adjacent colleges and business centers as well as ports.

Xiasheng's Unique district,Replace the campus,lower cost, can only be built on land along the coast, and Marine resources, port, commercial and industrial zone adjacent to provide a host of adjacent addition, for commerical hub and harbor provides a number of adjacent addition, provide + 4 industrial zone [ICON_PRODUCTION]productivity, unlock the education of science and technology, the area of adjacent bonus [ICON_CULTURE]culture are also provided.

Unique building of Eden,Replace University, lower cost，+4[ICON_SCIENCE]science和+4[ICON_PRODUCTION]production，When the power[ICON_Power] supply is sufficient，provide extra +3[ICON_SCIENCE]science and [ICON_PRODUCTION]production
The mode of building city on the sea
After this mode is turned on, all the civilizations used by human players can build cities on the sea
Eden unique unit,with lower cost,it can be recovered in neutral territory. Unless it is adjacent to the unit, it can only be found by naval attackers,Unique upgrade tree.
It can be recovered in neutral territory. Unless it is adjacent to the unit, it can only be found by naval attackers.

Replace.Text: Ocean watcher

Row.Text: She is not good at anything, but she is the best at eating---Xiasheng said
Mr. Xia Sheng,after all, I am high-performance! ---Atri
Provide + {1_num}[ICON_GOLD]gold coins when you are adjacent to the Longsi's factory
Provide + {1_num}[ICON_SCIENCE]technology when you are adjacent to the Longsi's factory
Adjacent commerical hub provide +{1_num} of production[ICON_PRODUCTION] adjacent bonus
Port adjacency harbor +{1_num} of production[ICON_PRODUCTION] adjacency bonus
Provide + {1_num}[ICON_GOLD]gold coins when you are adjacent to the grandma's lab
Adjacent to grandma's lab provide +4 [ICON_PRODUCTION]productivity bonus
Industrial zone adjacent provides +{1_num} of [ICON_SCIENCE]technology adjacent bonuses
Commerical hub adjacent provides +{1_num} of [ICON_SCIENCE]technology adjacent bonuses
Harbor adjacent provides +{1_num} of [ICON_SCIENCE]technology adjacent bonuses
SeaResource adjacent provides +{1_num} of [ICON_SCIENCE]technology adjacent bonuses
It's too close! (At least {1_iRange} plots away)
If the movement force allows, you can attack once more per turn
+1Visual field range和+10[ICON_Strength]Attack and + 1 additional attack times per round

Replace.Text: Atri is the robot girl who picked up from the bottom of the sea by Xia Sheng. It's so exquisitely constructed that it's human like, and it's full of expression and curiosity. But sleeping on the bottom of the sea, she lost part of her memory, so she petitioned Xia Sheng to find her lost memory.

He once studied in an elite school in a city known as a research institute, but for some reason he left school and moved to a small seaside town where grandma lived. When he was a child, the psychological trauma "phantom limb pain" would occur when he was in a dark place because the accident lost his mother and right foot. To buy expensive robotic prostheses, it is necessary to salvage the legacy of sinking under the sea with a submarine once a grandmother of marine geologist.

Atri is the robot girl who picked up from the bottom of the sea by Xia Sheng. It's so exquisitely constructed that it's human like, and it's full of expression and curiosity. But sleeping on the bottom of the sea, she lost part of her memory, so she petitioned Xia Sheng to find her lost memory.

He once studied in an elite school in a city known as a research institute, but for some reason he left school and moved to a small seaside town where grandma lived. When he was a child, the psychological trauma "phantom limb pain" would occur when he was in a dark place because the accident lost his mother and right foot. To buy expensive robotic prostheses, it is necessary to salvage the legacy of sinking under the sea with a submarine once a grandmother of marine geologist.
This is Atri. Are you here to help us？
Well，Welcome to visit.
Hello，This is Atri.
Yes, after all, I am high-performance！
I don't believe you. I don't accept your friendship.
Yes, after all, I am high-performance！
I don't believe you. I don't accept your friendship.
You think that's going to destroy Atri's home? We declare war on you now!
You think that's going to destroy Atri's home? We declare war on you now!
Atri has never seen such a brazen person like you, you turn my stomach！
Atri has never seen such a brazen person like you, you turn my stomach！
Those who tried to invade Eden have been buried at the bottom of the sea. Do you want to have a try?
I accept your kindness, but I won't accept it until I know what you really think of Eden.
This exchange is good for Eden and we accept it.
This is Xia Sheng, do you want to see me？
Well，Welcome to visit.
Hello，This is Xia Sheng.
All right, I accept your friendship!
I don't believe you. I don't accept your friendship.
All right, I accept your friendship!
I don't believe you. I don't accept your friendship.
Then I'm going to have to attack you!
Then I'm going to have to attack you!
Why did you do that?
Why did you do that?
We mean no harm, ask your troops not to stay here.
I accept your kindness, but I won't accept it until I know what you really think of Eden.
This exchange is good for Eden and we accept it.
I am very glad that you have fewer coastal cities.
I'm very unhappy that you have too many coastal cities.
